name: Civilization 3 Scenario File
summary: Learn about .BIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BIX files are used by Civilization III: Play the World, a multiplayer expansion pack to Civ3. They are used by version 11.0 and later of the expansion.

description: Game file created by "Sid Meier's Civilization III" (Civ3), an empire-building strategy game; may be a saved game or a scenario that describes the world conditions under which the player plays against other empires.
